name: Python 3 (micromamba)
postCreateCommand: micromamba create -y -p /opt/conda/envs/dev python=3.11 pip && /opt/conda/envs/dev/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && /opt/conda/envs/dev/bin/pip install -r /workspace/requirements.txt || true
postStartCommand: micromamba shell init -s bash -p /opt/conda || true; echo 'micromamba activate /opt/conda/envs/dev' >> ~/.bashrc || true
